website_summaries.verdict: Highly accurate and reliable with an impressive 300-foot range.
pros: Boasts an accuracy within 1 mile per hour, making it a great option for sports
The impressive range sets this model apart from less expensive radar guns
The hard carrying case is convenient
cons: Far more expensive than its competitors
Some customers were underwhelmed by the battery life

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but very low battery life
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be accurate but battery life only about one hour, not sure if I received defective battery or I just need to order a couple more. Be sure to charge every night before use.
customer_reviews.author: TIM F.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Device
customer_reviews.text: Never could make myself spend the money for a radar gun, and looked at the cheaper brands, but am SO glad I purchased this one. Easy to use and extremely accurate. Great features and the battery life is sensational. Also, the customer support from Stalker is second to none! My sons use this to keep records of the velocity of the ball leaving their bat in batting practice and off the tea.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: You can get the cheap radar guns which I have had in the past and then after purchasing this one you realize what you have been missing. Remarkable and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is totally awesome, and best of all
customer_reviews.text: I would compare this gun to the Jugs gun any day. It is totally awesome, and best of all, it is easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy M.

customer_reviews.title: Just a GREAT Tool
customer_reviews.text: Huge Quality - love how it measures both release point and arrival speed - which is perfect for teaching kids how to throw their changeup vs. fastball. Just great to have this to confirm the facts and also show kids that the better their mechanics are the faster the ball can travel.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M. Schoch

customer_reviews.title: Use it in games
customer_reviews.text: Pretty accurate. Compared with other scouts gun that's like double of the price of this gun. shows the same speed 9 out of 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Pei Yuan Wei

customer_reviews.title: As advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Product came as advertised. Great tool for my fast-pitch athletes. Pitching/throwing and bat speed.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great radar gun, very easy to use, love the hard carrying case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FOR SERIOUS COACHES
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and consistent reads. Very versatile. Rechargeable battery lasted through a double header. You simply cant beat the range of this gun. Love that it reads precise release as well as plate speeds. Carrying case is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: DowntownRDB

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line
customer_reviews.text: This radar has a lot of nice features that most of the other radars do not have. I like that it reports to tenths of a mph. I also like that it reports both release (peak) and plate speed at the same time. It also has better range than most of the other radar models available. The features come at a premium price wise but if you care about accuracy and consistency this is the best radar I have tried. This is one of three different radars I have used and it is my favorite. I also like that you can set it to continuous mode or control it by the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Collins

product_meta.title: Stalker Sport 2 Radar – Deluxe Package. Free UPS Ground Shipping is back. Your order ships directly from the Stalker Radar factory. Choose the brand that all of the Major League teams use - Stalker Sport Radar.
product_meta.description: Stalker Scout Package includes: * Stalker Sport 2 Radar * 6 AA NiMH rechageable batteries * Wall charger * Comprehensive User Manual * Hard Carry Box The next-generation Stalker Sport 2 is the powerful, and easy to use baseball solution. Quickly and easily measure pitching and running speeds with (2) active speed windows. All 30 Major League Baseball teams use Stalker Baseball guns. In a class of their own, Stalker Baseball guns dramatically outperform other "toy radar" guns. Simple operation, certified accuracy, greater range, true pitch speeds, and consistent readings make Stalker Baseball guns stand alone.
feature_bullets: Direct from the manufacturer at the lowest available price.
Measures ball speeds from 5-150 mph. Accurate to +/- 1 mph.
Captures release speed and plate speed simultaneously.
Built by the industry leader - Stalker Radar.
